name: Water regulations, planning controls and design strategies
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Water management - both drought and flooding - is presenting increasing challenges. What is the national policy, standards and what do we need? Hertfordshire is one of the driest counties in the UK with average rainfall returning two-thirds of the national average while the people in Hertfordshire use 8% more water than the national average. The Building Futures Team at Hertfordshire County Council has been addressing this issue and incorporating in a Sustainable Design Checklist. How can built environment professionals find holistic solutions through the implementation of effective design strategies?
